entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Grand Bank
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 7:30 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: 44 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm north of Terrenceville. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm north of Terrenceville. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
